thread.title: Four Seasons Hotels In Guangzhou, Shanghai And Beijing Jointly Celebrate Third Anniversary
thread.title_full: Four Seasons Hotels In Guangzhou, Shanghai And Beijing Jointly Celebrate Third Anniversary

author: Chisa Boonmee
title: Four Seasons Hotels In Guangzhou, Shanghai And Beijing Jointly Celebrate Third Anniversary
text:
Four Seasons Hotel Guangzhou , Four Seasons Hotel Pudong, Shanghai and Four Seasons Hotel Beijing are jointly celebrating their upcoming third year anniversary with a Three Years Triple Happiness package . 
Valid until November 8, 2015, this anniversary package entitles guests to CNY 688 hotel credit on bookings of minimum two nights at the Best Available Rate at any of the celebrating hotels. Guests can use the credit towards restaurants, lounges, mini bar, spa (except retail shop) or as indicated by the hotel to enhance their stay experience. 
For reservations, contact: Four Seasons Hotel Guangzhou at 86 (20) 8883-3888 Four Seasons Hotel Pudong, Shanghai at 86 (21) 2036-8888 or book online Four Seasons Hotel Beijing at 86 (10) 5695-8858 or book online Share this:
